Txt_Talk_OliviaMisaki_Out_MAIN_0_SCENE_0.Text: A plaintive voice echoes over the waves...
The lovers' locket begins to float!
My beloved... My soulmate... I have awaited your return all through these long years...
Curse the fates for keeping us from each other.
But I swear I will never leave you again.
At last, we can be together forever.

Txt_Talk_OliviaMisaki_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text:
*: ♪ Oh, Olivia, fraught at the fate of her beau...
Who was swept overboard in a storm, don't you know...
In the ocean right here did her fair young self throwww! ♪

*: ♪ But the peace of the grave, it was not to be hers...
Nay, for when a ship passes, her spirit it stirs...
And its passage beyond this here point it deterrrs! ♪

*: ♪ Oh, if only a saviour would come here and show...
Her a mark of their love that she might come to know...
That her promised, her Eric, he still loves her sooo! ♪

*: ♪ Then perhaps her poor spirit might know peace at last...
And her soul to the heavenly realm perhaps pass...
But to whom might we entrust this perilous taaask? ♪

*: ♪ For, if seafarers' stories are to be believed...
Eric's vessel yet wanders the cold, lonely seas...
A ghost ship borne on an ethereal breeeze! ♪

*: ♪ Oh yes, peace has returned to this fair place at last...
'Tis as tranquil indeed as the heavens are vast...
And the ships, they once more by the headland do paaass! ♪

*: ♪ Could it be that Olivia's soul, it now sleeps?
And her Eric, once lost out there upon the deep...
Has come home into harbour, his vow for to keeep? ♪

Txt_Talk_OliviaMisaki_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_032.Text: *: They say there's a prison on an island in the middle of this lake.
*: Apparently, it's haunted by the spirits of the prisoners who died there... (shiver)
